dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3825344C] Abuse Report
dmca.body:
-----Original Message----- From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] Sent: Thursday, April 12, 2007 12:56 AM To: DMCA Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3825344C] Abuse Report ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. Abuse Report Added by system at Wednesday, Apr 11 2007 06:32 pm X-MailFrom: piracy@viprecords.co.uk X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [216.12.192.67] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for ; Wed Apr 11 18:32:30 2007 Received: (qmail 18109 invoked by alias); 11 Apr 2007 23:32:28 -0000 Delivered-To: abuse@inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net Received: (qmail 18106 invoked from network); 11 Apr 2007 23:32:24 -0000 Received: from smtp01.theplanet.com (70.87.6.110) by inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net with SMTP; 11 Apr 2007 23:32:24 -0000 Received: from mail.theplanet.com ([216.185.111.52]) by smtp01.theplanet.com with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Wed, 11 Apr 2007 18:32:24 -0500 Return-path: Delivery-date: Wed, 11 Apr 2007 18:32:24 -0500 Received: from mx02.inside.filter.theplanet.com ([172.16.214.181] helo=mx02.filter.theplanet.com) by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from piracy@viprecords.co.uk) with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1HbmIZ-0003Ww-9v; Wed, 11 Apr 2007 18:32:23 -0500 Received: from mtaout01-winn.ispmail.ntl.com ([81.103.221.47]) by mx02.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from piracy@viprecords.co.uk) with esmtp (Exim) id 1HbmIW-000MXq-SO; Wed, 11 Apr 2007 18:32:21 -0500 Received: from aamtaout03-winn.ispmail.ntl.com ([81.103.221.35]) by mtaout01-winn.ispmail.ntl.com with ESMTP id <20070411233224.EGLT2491.mtaout01-winn.ispmail.ntl.com@aamtaout03-winn.ispmail.ntl.com>; Thu, 12 Apr 2007 00:32:24 +0100 Received: from ps3vgkpow02p83 ([86.20.47.74]) by aamtaout03-winn.ispmail.ntl.com with SMTP id <20070411233137.BHDP26699.aamtaout03-winn.ispmail.ntl.com@ps3vgkpow02p83>; Thu, 12 Apr 2007 00:31:37 +0100 Message-ID: <003201c77c91$80e916d0$0202a8c0@ps3vgkpow02p83> Reply-To: "Pal \(VIP Records\)" From: "Pal \(VIP Records\)" To: , Cc: Subject: Abuse Report Date: Thu, 12 Apr 2007 00:30:58 +0100 Organization: VIP Records Limited MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/mixed; boundary="----=_NextPart_000_0028_01C77C99.D6EA5370" X-Priority: 3 X-MSMail-Priority: Normal X-Mailer: Microsoft Outlook Express 6.00.2900.2180 X-MimeOLE: Produced By Microsoft MimeOLE V6.00.2900.2180 X-OriginalArrivalTime: 11 Apr 2007 23:32:24.0456 (UTC) FILETIME=[A8A0C880:01C77C91] (multipart/mixed) Multipart prefix (text/plain) This is a multi-part message in MIME format. (multipart/alternative) MIME element (text/plain) Hi, Im Pal from VIP Records Ltd. We have noticed you guys are hosting desitorrents.com who has uploaded copyright infringing material. A. Electronic signature of Vipen Kumar owner and manager of VIP Records Ltd, I have been authorised to act on behalf of Vipen Kumar. http://www.viprecords.co.uk/externals/pal/signaturecopy.gif B & C. All of our albums are being shared on this website, Not only ours but nearly every record labels music is being shared!! Our latest release has been uploaded and this website has given access to thousands to download it. Below is the details: We have just released an album - Jags Klimax - The Album. Host : desitorrents.com IP Address : 74.53.115.140 We are members of the BPI and we will be passing on the details to them if this site is not dealt with. We kindly request for this link to be removed. The actual link where the album is: http://www.desitorrents.com/forums/showthread.php?t=143545 D. Information of the label: Pal Singh VIP Records 11 Vexhim Park, Edinburgh, Fife EH15 3SB Great Britain (GB) Telephone: +447984150067 E. This information is correct, He has uploaded illegal copyrighted music on to his website. Allowing hundreds of users to download this. I Pritpal Singh can confirm i have not given ANY permission to Desitorrents.com to use our music and uploaded it on the internet. I have asked him kindly to remove our files but got no response back! Statement from Brian Engel: To whom It may concern, It is hereby confirmed, under the penalty of perjury, that the copyright in the recordings relating to any legal actions requested by us, the Complaining Party, belong EXCLUSIVELY to us, Messrs 4Play Records/Music. Signed: Brian Engel, 4Play Records F. Statement: I can confirm that all the information provided is correct, the owners deliberatly allow this to happen, even though i request not to. Many other record labels albums are being shared in this hub, which are all copyrighted. I, Pritpal Singh am authorized on behalf of Vipen Kumar the copyright owner (VIP Records Ltd). To whom it may concern, I Brian Engel of Brian Engel Publishing, confirm, under penalty of perjury, that I have an exclusive undertaking from Messrs 4Play Music to administer their entire publishing catalogue and that no permission to use this copyright material has been sought from, or granted by, this company for such website use. Signed: Brian Engel , 4Play Music Please read our full Copyright statement here: http://www.viprecords.co.uk/externals/pal/brian_engel_statement_of_copyright.htm My company has an exclusive agreement with VIP records. All VIP's copyright works are consequently administered by this company. It is an offence under the Copyright Designs and Patents Act 1988 to allow them to be commercially exploited without first having obtaining permission from the Copyright owners of the master recordings (VIP) and the publishing copyright owners (VIP/Brian Engel Publishing). The website can contact VIP and Brian Engel Publishing and request permission to include the material on the site. VIP may give permission for the use of the MASTER rights on the site, but B.E.P. may refuse permission for the publishing rights (or vice versa). Brian Engel brian@brianengel.co.uk All information provided is 100% accurate with your compliance and is clearly written out for you to read and check over. This domain is allowing ILLEGAL copyrighted file downloading, i really hope you guys get something done about this, because of these guys our industry really suffers to survive. Please get action taken immediately as this is seriously ruining our Asian music industry. Not forgetting to mention this domain has been report many times before, but you continue to host it. Regards, Pal VIP Records Limited email: piracy@viprecords.co.uk website: www.viprecords.co.uk ******************************************************* NOTE: The information in this email is confidential and may be legally privileged. If you are not the intended recipient, you must not read, use or disseminate that information. Please notify the sender. This e-mail is provided for general information purposes only. For the avoidance of doubt the contents of this email will not constitute a legally binding contract. Any opinions or advice contained in this email are not necessarily those of VIP Record Limited. Although this email and any attachments are believed to be free of any virus, or any other defect which might affect any computer or IT system into which they are received and opened, it is the responsibility of the recipient to ensure that they are virus free and no responsibility is accepted by VIP Records Limited for any loss or damage arising in any way from receipt or use thereof. Further information on VIP Records Limited can be found at www.viprecords.co.uk ******************************************************** MIME element (text/html)
Hi, Im Pal from VIP Records Ltd. We have noticed you guys are hosting desitorrents.com who has uploaded copyright infringing material.
 
A. Electronic signature of Vipen Kumar owner and manager of VIP Records Ltd, I have been authorised to act on behalf of Vipen Kumar.
http://www.viprecords.co.uk/externals/pal/signaturecopy.gif
 
B & C. All of our albums are being shared on this website, Not only ours but nearly every record labels music is being shared!! Our latest release has been uploaded and this website has given access to thousands to download it. Below is the details:
 
We have just released an album - Jags Klimax - The Album.
 
     Host       : desitorrents.com
     IP Address : 74.53.115.140
 
We are members of the BPI and we will be passing on the details to them if this site is not dealt with. We kindly request for this link to be removed.
 
The actual link where the album is:
http://www.desitorrents.com/forums/showthread.php?t=143545
 
D. Information of the label:
Pal Singh
VIP Records
11 Vexhim Park,
Edinburgh,
Fife EH15 3SB
Great Britain (GB)
 
Telephone:
+447984150067
 
E. This information is correct, He has uploaded illegal copyrighted music on to his website. Allowing hundreds of users to download this.
 
I Pritpal Singh can confirm i have not given ANY permission to

Desitorrents.com

to use our music and uploaded it on the internet. I have asked him kindly to remove our files but got no response back!
 
Statement from Brian Engel:

To whom It may concern,
 
It is hereby confirmed, under the penalty of perjury, that the copyright in the recordings relating to any legal actions requested by us, the Complaining Party, belong EXCLUSIVELY to us, Messrs 4Play Records/Music.
 
Signed: Brian Engel, 4Play Records
F. Statement: I can confirm that all the information provided is correct, the owners deliberatly allow this to happen, even though i request not to. Many other record labels albums are being shared in this hub, which are all copyrighted. I, Pritpal Singh am authorized on behalf of Vipen Kumar the copyright owner (VIP Records Ltd).
 
To whom it may concern,
 
I Brian Engel of Brian Engel Publishing, confirm, under penalty of perjury, that I have an exclusive undertaking from Messrs 4Play Music to administer their entire publishing catalogue and that no permission to use this copyright material has been sought from, or granted by, this company for such website use.
 
Signed: Brian Engel , 4Play Music
 
Please read our full Copyright statement here: http://www.viprecords.co.uk/externals/pal/brian_engel_statement_of_copyright.htm
 
My company has an exclusive agreement with VIP records. All VIP
